description.english: Obtain all other achievements.
description.schinese: 已获得所有成就
description.japanese: 全ての実績を達成した。
description.tchinese: 已獲得所有成就

description.english: Reach the rank of a Canard.
description.schinese: 将图书馆评级升为“传闻”
description.japanese: あらぬ噂を達成した。
description.tchinese: 將圖書館評級升為“傳聞”

description.english: Reach the rank of an Urban Myth.
description.schinese: 将图书馆评级升为“都市怪谈”
description.japanese: 都市怪談を達成した。
description.tchinese: 將圖書館評級升為“都市怪談”

description.english: Reach the rank of an Urban Legend.
description.schinese: 将图书馆评级升为“都市传说”
description.japanese: 都市伝説を達成した。
description.tchinese: 將圖書館評級升為“都市傳說”

description.english: Reach the rank of an Urban Plague.
description.schinese: 将图书馆评级升为“都市恶疾”
description.japanese: 都市疾病を達成した。
description.tchinese: 將圖書館評級升為“都市惡疾”

description.english: Reach the rank of an Urban Nightmare.
description.schinese: 将图书馆评级升为“都市梦魇”
description.japanese: 都市悪夢を達成した。
description.tchinese: 將圖書館評級升為“都市夢魘”

displayName.english: One Night I Count the Stars

description.english: Reach the rank of a Star of the City.
description.schinese: 将图书馆评级升为“都市之星”
description.japanese: 都市の星を達成した。
description.tchinese: 將圖書館評級升為“都市之星”

description.english: Be considered an Impurity.
description.schinese: 将图书馆评级升为“杂质”
description.japanese: 不純物を達成した。
description.tchinese: 將圖書館評級升為“雜質”

description.english: Complete the reception of Tomerry.
description.schinese: 战胜“汤吗丽”
description.japanese: トマリーの接待を完了した。
description.tchinese: 戰勝“湯嗎麗”

displayName.english: And Then is Heard No More
displayName.koreana: And Then is Heard No More
displayName.schinese: And Then is Heard No More
displayName.japanese: And Then is Heard No More
displayName.tchinese: And Then is Heard No More

description.english: Complete the reception of the Crying Children.
description.schinese: 战胜“哭泣之子”
description.japanese: 泣く子の接待を完了した。
description.tchinese: 戰勝“哭泣之子”

description.english: Complete the reception of Xiao.
description.schinese: 战胜“邵”
description.japanese: シャオの接待を完了した。
description.tchinese: 戰勝“邵”

description.english: Complete the reception of 얀샋ㄷ요무.
description.schinese: 战胜“rnfmabj”
description.japanese: ,D@;Q7Yの接待を完了した。
description.tchinese: 戰勝“su.3fm u;6”

description.english: Complete the reception of the Reverberation Ensemble.
description.schinese: 战胜“残响乐团”
description.japanese: 残響楽団の接待を完了した。
description.tchinese: 戰勝“殘響樂團”

description.english: Complete the reception of the Black Silence.
description.schinese: 战胜“漆黑噤默”
description.japanese: 黒い沈黙の接待を完了した。
description.tchinese: 戰勝“漆黑噤默”

description.english: Complete the reception of the Distorted Reverb Ensemble.
description.schinese: 战胜“扭曲残响乐团”
description.japanese: ねじれた残響楽団の接待を完了した。
description.tchinese: 戰勝“扭曲殘響樂團”

displayName.english: The Will to Stand up Straight

description.english: Fully realized the Floor of History.
description.schinese: 历史层完全解放
description.japanese: 歴史の階を完全開放した。
description.tchinese: 將歷史層完全解放

displayName.japanese: 分別することの出来る理性

description.english: Fully realized the Floor of Technological Sciences.
description.schinese: 科技层完全解放
description.japanese: 技術科学の階を完全開放した。
description.tchinese: 將科技層完全解放

displayName.english: The Hope to be a Better Person
displayName.koreana: 더 나은 존재가 될 수 있다는 희망
displayName.japanese: より良い存在に成れるという希望

description.english: Fully realized the Floor of Literature.
description.schinese: 文学层完全解放
description.japanese: 文学の階を完全開放した。
description.tchinese: 將文學層完全解放

displayName.english: The Fearlessness to keep on Living
displayName.japanese: 人生を連ねていくという勇気

description.english: Fully realized the Floor of Art.
description.schinese: 艺术层完全解放
description.japanese: 芸術の階を完全開放した。
description.tchinese: 將藝術層完全解放

displayName.english: The Expectation for the Meaning of Existence
displayName.japanese: 存在意義に対する期待

description.english: Fully realized the Floor of Natural Sciences.
description.schinese: 自然层完全解放
description.japanese: 自然科学の階を完全開放した。
description.tchinese: 將自然層完全解放

description.english: Fully realized the Floor of Language.
description.schinese: 语言层完全解放
description.japanese: 言語の階を完全開放した。
description.tchinese: 將語言層完全解放

displayName.english: Those who are Faithful and Trustworthy
displayName.koreana: 기꺼이 믿으며 맡길 수 있는 상대
displayName.japanese: 快く信じて任せられる相手

description.english: Fully realized the Floor of Social Sciences.
description.schinese: 社会层完全解放
description.japanese: 社会科学の階を完全開放した。
description.tchinese: 將社會層完全解放

displayName.english: The Eye Facing the Fear; Breaking the Cycle
displayName.schinese: 直面恐惧 斩断循环
displayName.japanese: 鎖を断ち切り恐怖に向き合う目
displayName.tchinese: 直面恐懼 斬斷循環

description.english: Fully realized the Floor of Philosophy.
description.schinese: 哲学层完全解放
description.japanese: 哲学の階を完全開放した。
description.tchinese: 將哲學層完全解放

displayName.english: The Eye Embracing the Past; Building the Future
displayName.schinese: 拥抱过去 创造未来
displayName.japanese: 過去を受け入れ、未来を創造する目
displayName.tchinese: 擁抱過去 創造未來

description.english: Fully realized the Floor of Religion.
description.schinese: 宗教层完全解放
description.japanese: 宗教の階を完全開放した。
description.tchinese: 將宗教層完全解放

description.english: Fully realized the Floor of General Works.
description.schinese: 总类层完全解放
description.japanese: 総記の階を完全開放した。
description.tchinese: 將總類層完全解放

description.english: Roland was rejected. Angela could not forgive him.
description.schinese: 安吉拉无法宽恕罗兰
description.japanese: ローランを赦さなかった。
description.tchinese: 安潔拉無法寬恕羅蘭

displayName.japanese: 苦痛を愛する為めの祈り

description.english: Angela was snubbed. Roland could not forgive her.
description.schinese: 罗兰无法宽恕安吉拉
description.japanese: アンジェラを赦さなかった。
description.tchinese: 羅蘭無法寬恕安潔拉

displayName.english: That’s This, and This is That
displayName.japanese: それもこれ、これもそれ

description.english: Roland and Angela chose to forgive each other.
description.schinese: 罗兰与安吉拉互相宽恕
description.japanese: アンジェラとローランがお互いを赦した。
description.tchinese: 羅蘭與安潔拉互相寬恕

displayName.japanese: コアページコレクター

description.english: Collect all Key Pages.
description.schinese: 获得所有核心书页
description.japanese: 全てのコアページを集めた。
description.tchinese: 獲得所有核心書頁

displayName.japanese: バトルページコレクター

description.english: Collect all Combat Pages.
description.schinese: 获得所有战斗书页
description.japanese: 全てのバトルページを集めた。
description.tchinese: 獲得所有戰鬥書頁

description.english: Collect 100 unique Battle Symbols.
description.schinese: 获得100种战斗表徵
description.japanese: 戦闘表象を100種類以上集めた。
description.tchinese: 累計獲得100種戰鬥表徵

description.english: View all Small Stories.
description.schinese: 观看所有司书小剧场
description.japanese: 全ての小話を読んだ。
description.tchinese: 觀看所有司書小劇場

description.english: Complete all receptions accessible by General Invitations.
description.schinese: 战胜所有普通邀请函来宾
description.japanese: 全ての一般招待状の接待を完了した。
description.tchinese: 戰勝所有普通邀請函來賓

description.english: Burn 100 books in total.
description.schinese: 燃烧100本书籍
description.japanese: 本を100冊燃やした。
description.tchinese: 累計燃燒100本書籍

displayName.english: Two Shakes of a Rat’s Tail

description.english: Complete your first reception. You’ve made your baby steps!
description.schinese: 首次战胜来宾
description.japanese: 接待を完了した。
description.tchinese: 第1次戰勝來賓

description.english: Burn a book for the first time.
description.schinese: 首次燃烧书籍
description.japanese: 本を燃やした。
description.tchinese: 第1次燃燒書籍

description.english: Acquired all the listed rewards from a book that contains an Objet d’art page.
description.koreana: 예술 책장이 있는 책에서 보상 목록에 있는 책장을 전부 획득했다.
description.schinese: 从1本包含艺术级书页的书籍中烧出所有奖励书页
description.japanese: 芸術ページのある本からリワードリストにあるページを全部獲得した。
description.tchinese: 從1本包含藝術級書頁的書籍中燒出所有獎勵書頁

description.english: Clear an Abnormality battle.
description.schinese: 首次成功镇压异想体
description.japanese: 幻想体バトルをクリアした。
description.tchinese: 第1次成功鎮壓異想體

description.english: Use an Abnormality page.
description.schinese: 首次使用异想体书页
description.japanese: 幻想体ページを使用した。
description.tchinese: 第1次使用異想體書頁

description.english: Use an E.G.O page.
description.schinese: 首次使用E.G.O书页
description.japanese: E.G.Oページを使用した。
description.tchinese: 第1次使用E.G.O書頁

description.english: Customize a librarian.
description.schinese: 首次调整司书
description.japanese: 司書の調整を行った。
description.tchinese: 第1次調整司書

description.english: Equip a Battle Symbol.
description.schinese: 首次为司书装备战斗表徵
description.japanese: 戦闘表象を装着した。
description.tchinese: 第1次為司書裝備戰鬥表徵

description.english: Fully equip a librarian with Battle Symbols.
description.koreana: 사서 1명의 모든 부위에 전투 표상을 장착했다.
description.schinese: 1名司书的所有部位均已装备战斗表徵
description.japanese: 司書1名の全部位に戦闘表象を装着した。
description.tchinese: 1名司書的所有部位均已裝備戰鬥表徵

description.english: Transfer a passive ability.
description.schinese: 首次转移被动能力
description.japanese: パッシブスキルを継承した。
description.tchinese: 第1次轉移被動能力

description.english: Send a General Invitation.
description.schinese: 首次发送普通邀请函
description.japanese: 一般招待状を送った。
description.tchinese: 第1次發送普通邀請函

description.english: Gain 15 Strength in a single Scene.
description.schinese: 1幕之内使1名司书至少获得15层“强壮”
description.japanese: 1幕にパワーを15以上得る。
description.tchinese: 1幕之內使1名司書至少獲得15層“強壯”

displayName.japanese: 静かにしてくださいっ！

description.english: Defeat a guest suffering from Burn, Bleed, Feeble, Disarm, Fragile, Paralysis, and Bind.
description.koreana: 손님 1명을 화상, 출혈, 허약, 무장해제, 취약, 마비, 속박을 부여한 상태에서 처치했다.
description.schinese: 击杀1名同时拥有“烧伤”，“流血”，“虚弱”，“破绽”，“易损”，“麻痹”与“束缚”7种负面状态的来宾
description.japanese: ゲスト1名を火傷、出血、虚弱、武装解除、脆弱、麻痺、束縛を付与した状態で倒した。
description.tchinese: 擊殺1名同時擁有“燒傷”，“流血”，“虛弱”，“破綻”，“易損”，“麻痺”與“束縛”7種負面狀態的來賓

displayName.japanese: ちょっとチクってしますよ～

description.english: Inflict 60 Bleed to a single guest.
description.schinese: 某一幕开始时1名来宾至少拥有60层“流血”
description.japanese: ゲスト1名に出血を60以上付与した。
description.tchinese: 某一幕開始時1名來賓至少擁有60層“流血”

displayName.japanese: アイ・アム・ファ～イヤ～

description.english: Defeat 5 guests through Burn damage in a single reception.
description.schinese: 在一场接待中通过“烧伤”伤害击杀5名来宾
description.japanese: 1接待にて火傷でゲスト5名を倒した。
description.tchinese: 在一場接待中通過“燒傷”傷害擊殺5名來賓

description.english: Defeat 5 guests at once using a single die of a Mass Attack.
description.schinese: 使用1颗群体攻击书页的骰子同时击杀5名来宾
description.japanese: 広域ダイス1つでゲスト5名を同時に倒した。
description.tchinese: 使用1顆群體攻擊書頁的骰子同時擊殺5名來賓

description.english: Deal 150 damage to a guest with a single attack.
description.koreana: 공격 한 번으로 손님 한 명에게 피해를 150 이상 주었다.
description.schinese: 使用1颗“进攻型”骰子对1名来宾至少造成150点伤害
description.japanese: 攻撃1回でゲストにダメージを150以上与えた。
description.tchinese: 使用1張戰鬥書頁對1名來賓至少造成150點傷害

description.english: Stagger a guest by deflecting.
description.schinese: 通过反震伤害使1名来宾陷入混乱
description.japanese: カウンターでゲストを混乱状態にした。
description.tchinese: 通過反震傷害使1名來賓陷入混亂

description.english: Complete a reception after both sides’ Team Emotion Levels have reached 5.
description.koreana: 사서와 손님 모두 팀 감정 단계 5를 달성하고 접대를 완료했다.
description.schinese: 所有来宾与司书的情感等级均达到5级后赢得胜利
description.japanese: 司書とゲストの両方が感情レベル5を達成してから接待を完了した。
description.tchinese: 所有來賓與司書的情感等級均達到5級後贏得勝利

description.english: Have a guest and a librarian perish at the same time.
description.schinese: 来宾与司书同时死亡
description.japanese: ゲストと司書が同時に死亡した。
description.tchinese: 來賓與司書同時死亡

description.english: Enter a combat phase without slotting any Speed die for all librarians who can act. Your finger probably slipped for this one.
description.koreana: 행동할 수 있는 모든 사서가 전투 책장을 장착하지 않고 전투를 시작했다.
description.schinese: 下令战斗时所有司书均未装备战斗书页 (也许您家有只喜欢按空格的猫主子？)
description.japanese: 行動可能な全ての司書がバトルページを装着せずに戦闘を開始した。
description.tchinese: 下令戰鬥時所有司書均未裝備戰鬥書頁，人非聖賢，手滑難免

displayName.japanese: 我が身体には幻想体が宿る！

description.english: Use an E.G.O page that synchronizes its user with the Abnormality.
description.schinese: 使用E.G.O书页与异想体“同化”
description.japanese: 幻想体に同化するE.G.Oページを使用した。
description.tchinese: 使用E.G.O書頁與異想體“同化”

description.english: Lower the Cost of a 4-Cost page to 0 with the Abnormality page 'Happy Memories' and use it on the Floor of History.
description.koreana: 역사의 층에서 원래 비용이 4인 책장의 비용을  '행복한 기억' 환상체 책장의 효과로 0으로 낮춘 후 사용했다.
description.schinese: 通过异想体书页“幸福的记忆”的效果将1张初始费用为4费的战斗书页减为0费并使用
description.japanese: 歴史の階にて本来のコストが4のページを「幸せな記憶」幻想体ページの効果で0にしたあと使用した。
description.tchinese: 通過異想體書頁“幸福的記憶”將1張初始費用為4費的戰鬥書頁減為0費並使用

displayName.english: “This magical bullet can truly hit anyone, just like you say.”
displayName.koreana: 어떤 사람이라도 맞출 수 있는 마법의 탄환이로구나.
displayName.schinese: 我这可是施了法的魔弹
displayName.japanese: どんな人であっても当たる魔法の弾丸なのだな。
displayName.tchinese: 我這可是施了法的魔彈

description.english: Defeat 5 guests marked by the Abnormality page 'Request' in a single reception on the Floor of Technological Sciences.
description.koreana: 기술과학의 층에서 한 접대 동안 '의뢰' 환상체 책장의 효과가 적용된 손님을 5명 처치했다.
description.schinese: 在一场接待中击杀5名处于“委托目标”状态的来宾
description.japanese: 技術科学の階の1接待にて「依頼」幻想体ページの効果が適応されたゲストを5人倒した。
description.tchinese: 在一場接待中擊殺5名擁有“委託目標”狀態的來賓

description.english: Deal 40 damage at once with the third die of the E.G.O page 'Sanguine Desire' on the Floor of Literature.
description.koreana: 문학의 층에서 '핏빛 욕망' EGO 책장의 3번째 주사위로 한번에 40 이상의 피해를 주었다.
description.schinese: 使用E.G.O书页“血欲”的第3颗骰子至少造成40点伤害
description.japanese: 文学の階にて「血色の欲望」E.G.Oページの3つ目のダイスで1度に40以上のダメージを与えた。
description.tchinese: 使用E.G.O書頁“血欲”的第3顆骰子至少造成40點傷害

description.english: Use the Combat Page 'Ever-repeating Performance' on a Scene where a guest planned to use a Mass Attack page on the Floor of Art.
description.koreana: 예술의 층에서 손님이 광역 책장을 장착한 막에  '반복되는 연주' 책장을 사용했다.
description.schinese: 在来宾即将使用群体攻击书页时使用特殊书页“返始咏叹调”
description.japanese: 芸術の階にてゲストが広域ページを装着した幕に「繰り返される演奏」ページを使用した。
description.tchinese: 在來賓準備使用群體攻擊書頁時使用特殊書頁“返始詠歎調”

description.english: Activate the ability of the Abnormality page 'Nix' on the Floor of Natural Sciences.
description.koreana: 자연과학의 층에서 '허무' 환상체 책장의 효과를 발동시켰다.
description.schinese: 触发异想体书页“虚无”的效果
description.japanese: 自然科学の階にて「虚無」幻想体ページの効果を発動させた。
description.tchinese: 觸發異想體書頁“虛無”的效果

displayName.english: “The smiling faces are unfamiliar yet sorrowful.”
displayName.schinese: 那些笑脸既陌生又惆怅
displayName.japanese: 沢山の笑う顔は見知らぬながらも物哀しい
displayName.tchinese: 那些笑臉既陌生又惆悵

description.english: Complete a Star of the City-level or above reception after selecting the Abnormality page 'Mountain of Corpses' on the Floor of Language.
description.koreana: 언어의 층에서 '시체들의 산' 환상체 책장을 선택한 후 도시의 별 이상 등급의 접대를 완료했다.
description.schinese: 在一场“都市之星”级别的接待中触发异想体书页“尸山”的效果并赢得胜利
description.japanese: 言語の階にて「死体の山」ページを選択し、都市の星ランク以上の接待を完了した。
description.tchinese: 在一場“都市之星”級別的接待中觸發異想體書頁“屍山”的效果並贏得勝利

description.english: Use 4 pages generated by the Abnormality page 'Rake' during a single reception on the Floor of Social Sciences.
description.koreana: 사회과학의 층에서 한 무대 동안  '갈퀴' 환상체 책장으로 생성된 책장을 4번 사용했다.
description.schinese: 在单个舞台中通过异想体书页“钉耙”的效果生成4张战斗书页并全部使用
description.japanese: 社会科学の階にて1舞台の間「熊手」幻想体ページで生成されたページを4回使用した。
description.tchinese: 在單個舞臺中使用4張通過異想體書頁“釘耙”生成的戰鬥書頁

displayName.english: “A big, scary monster lives in the black, dusky forest!”
displayName.koreana: 검고 어두운 숲에는 크고 무서운 괴물이 산다!
displayName.schinese: 黑森林里住着一头可怕的大怪兽！
displayName.japanese: 黒くて暗い森には大きくて恐ろしい怪物が棲んでるんだ！
displayName.tchinese: 黑森林裡住著一頭可怕的大怪獸！

description.english: Activate the ability of the Abnormality page 'The Beast' on the Floor of Philosophy.
description.koreana: 철학의 층에서 '괴수' 환상체 책장의 효과를 발동시켰다.
description.schinese: 触发异想体书页“大怪兽”的效果
description.japanese: 哲学の階にて「怪獣」幻想体ページの効果を発動させた。
description.tchinese: 觸發異想體書頁“大怪獸”的效果

displayName.schinese: 我们未能击穿敌人的反甲

description.english: Deal 100 total damage using the Abnormality page 'Lean, Bloody Wings' in a single Act on the Floor of Religion.
description.koreana: 종교의 층에서 한 무대 동안 '앙상한 핏빛 날개' 환상체 책장의 효과로 피해를 100 이상 주었다.
description.schinese: 在单个舞台中通过异想体书页“萎缩的血翼”的效果至少造成100点伤害
description.japanese: 宗教の階にて1舞台の間「か細い真紅の翼」幻想体ページの効果でダメージを100以上与えた。
description.tchinese: 在單個舞臺中通過異想體書頁“萎縮的血翼”的效果至少造成100點傷害

description.english: Defeat 3 guests after selecting the Abnormality page 'Fervent Beats' during a single reception on the Floor of General Works.
description.koreana: 총류의 층에서 한 접대 동안 '몰아치는 박동' 환상체 책장을 고른 후 3명의 손님을 처치했다.
description.schinese: 在一场接待中应用异想体书页“剧烈搏动”并击杀3名来宾
description.japanese: 総記の階にて1接待の間「押し寄せる鼓動」幻想体ページを選び、3人のゲストを倒した。
description.tchinese: 在一場接待中應用異想體書頁“劇烈搏動”並擊殺3名來賓

description.english: Roll the maximum value when using 'Boundary of Death'.
description.schinese: 使用战斗书页“生死界限”掷出最大值
description.japanese: 死の境界にて最大値が出た。
description.tchinese: 使用戰鬥書頁“生死界限”擲出最大值

description.english: Defeat a guest from the Thumb or the Index with Pete’s Key Page equipped.
description.koreana: 피트의 핵심 책장을 장착하고 엄지, 검지 소속의 손님을 처치했다.
description.schinese: 装备“皮特之页”并击杀1名拇指或食指麾下的来宾
description.japanese: ピートのコアページを装着し、親指・人差し指所属のゲストを倒した。
description.tchinese: 裝備“皮特之頁”並擊殺拇指或食指麾下的來賓

displayName.japanese: バケモンにはバケモンをぶつけんだよ！

description.english: Defeat the Red Mist as Gebura.
description.schinese: Gebura亲手击杀殷红迷雾-卡莉
description.japanese: ゲブラーで赤い霧を倒した。
description.tchinese: Gebura親手擊殺殷紅迷霧-卡莉

displayName.english: The Red Mist Makes Her Return
displayName.japanese: 赤い霧が帰ってきました。

description.english: Have Gebura manifest the E.G.O of the Red Mist during a reception.
description.schinese: Gebura展现殷红迷雾E.G.O
description.japanese: ゲブラーが接待にて赤い霧のE.G.Oを覚醒した。
description.tchinese: Gebura展現殷紅迷霧E.G.O

displayName.japanese: ビナー様がログインなさいました。

description.english: Complete a reception with Binah offering her assistance.
description.schinese: Binah参战并赢得胜利
description.japanese: ビナーが参戦した状態で接待を完了した。
description.tchinese: Binah參戰並贏得勝利

displayName.english: “Sending you here was worth my while.”
displayName.koreana: 이 정도는 되어야 널 보낸 가치가 있지.
displayName.japanese: これくらいならお前を送った価値があるな。

description.english: Defeat the Purple Tear as Roland.
description.schinese: 罗兰亲手击杀堇紫泪滴-伊織
description.japanese: ローランで紫の涙を倒した。
description.tchinese: 羅蘭親手擊殺堇紫淚滴-伊織

displayName.english: “…To die at the hands of a hero.”

description.english: Finish off Myo once and for all as Gebura with the Red Mist’s Key Page equipped.
description.koreana: 붉은안개의 핵심 책장을 장착한 게부라로 묘를 완전히 처치했다.
description.schinese: Gebura装备“殷红迷雾之页”并亲手击杀缪
description.japanese: 赤い霧のコアページを装着したゲブラーでミョを完全に倒した。
description.tchinese: Gebura裝備“殷紅迷霧之頁”並親手擊殺繆

displayName.english: Do Cloned Rabbits Dream of Rapid Gashes?
displayName.koreana: 복제 토끼는 연속 절단의 꿈을 꾸는가
displayName.schinese: 克隆兔会梦见连续切吗？
displayName.japanese: 複製ウサギは連続切断の夢を見るか？
displayName.tchinese: 複製兔子會夢見連續切割嗎？

description.english: Use the Combat Page 'Clone' to possess 6 of a single Combat Page in hand.
description.koreana: '복제' 전투 책장을 사용하여 동일한 전투 책장 6장을 손에 모았다.
description.schinese: 某一幕开始时手中持有6张同名书页
description.japanese: 「複製」バトルページを使用し、同じバトルページを6枚手元に集めた。
description.tchinese: 手中持有6張同名書頁

description.english: Defeat Olivier and Argalia using the Combat Page 'Furioso'.
description.koreana: Furioso 전투 책장으로 올리비에와 아르갈리아를 처치했다.
description.schinese: 使用特殊书页“Furioso”击杀奥利维耶与阿尔加利亚
description.japanese: Furiosoバトルページでオリヴィエとアルガリアを倒した。
description.tchinese: 使用特殊書頁“Furioso”擊殺奧利維耶與阿爾加利亞

description.english: Finish the final reception without any participant being incapacitated.
description.koreana: 마지막 접대에서 아무도 전투 불능이 되지 않았다.
description.schinese: 最终接待中没有任何司书无法战斗
description.japanese: 最後の接待にて、誰も戦闘不能状態にならなかった。
description.tchinese: 最終接待中沒有任何司書無法戰鬥
